name: Solo Dance
description:
Bring out your best performance - dance, sing, act and make the stage your spotlight.
Round 1: auditions.
Round 2: Stage performance 
1. Minimum and maximum time limit for the performance shall be defined after the audition round.
2. Minimum time to be performed for audition is 2 minutes. 
3. A rule book after the auditions shall be circulated.
title: Dance to the rhythm of your soul, be it classical, semiclassical, hip-hop, break dance or a category you want to invent yourself.

name: Solo Singing
description:
Bring out your best performance - dance, sing, act and make the stage your spotlight.
Round 1: auditions.
Round 2: Stage performance
1. Minimum and maximum time limit for the performance shall be defined after the audition round.
2. Minimum time to be performed for audition is 2 minutes. 
3. A rule book after the auditions shall be circulated.
title: Sing your heart out, you may choose one song, or sing medleys. It is preferred you sing on karaoke track. However if you want accompanists, maximum two accompanists will be permitted.

name: Instrumental
description:
Bring out your best performance - dance, sing, act and make the stage your spotlight.
Round 1: auditions.
Round 2: Stage performance 
1. Minimum and maximum time limit for the performance shall be defined after the audition round.
2. Minimum time to be performed for audition is 2 minutes. 
3. A rule book after the auditions shall be circulated.
title: Show the best instrument you can play. Drums, guitar, flute, keyboard, harmonium, tabla etc. You will have to bring your own instrument.

name: Group Song
description:
Bring out your best performance - dance, sing, act and make the stage your spotlight.
Round 1: auditions.
Round 2: Stage performance 
1.Minimum and maximum time limit for the performance shall be defined after the audition round.
2.Minimum time to be performed for audition is 2 minutes. 
3.A rule book after the auditions shall be circulated.
title: Entertain the audience with your best performance. Any dance style allowed- folk, Bollywood, semiclassical, do what your heart says. Minimum 2 and maximum 10 participants are allowed in a group.

name: Group Dance
description:
Bring out your best performance - dance, sing, act and make the stage your spotlight. 
Round 1: auditions.
Round 2: Stage performance 
1. Minimum and maximum time limit for the performance shall be defined after the audition round.
2. Minimum time to be performed for audition is 2 minutes. 
3. A rule book after the auditions shall be circulated.
title: Entertain the audience with your best performance. Any dance style allowed- folk, Bollywood, semiclassical, do what your heart says. Minimum 2 and maximum 10 participants are allowed in a group.

name: Scene-e-magic
description:
Bring out your best performance - dance, sing, act and make the stage your spotlight. 
Round 1: auditions.
Round 2: Stage performance 
1. Minimum and maximum time limit for the performance shall be defined after the audition round.
2. Minimum time to be performed for audition is 2 minutes. 
3. A rule book after the auditions shall be circulated.
title: Give your own dialogues to a movie scene and show your creativity. Minimum 2 and maximum 5 participants are allowed in the group. Do not use vulgar dialogues.
